title: Saving the Book of Commandments
subtitle: By Arie Van De Graaff
content: When a mob destroyed the press that was printing the Book of Commandments, sisters Mary Elizabeth and Caroline Rollins risked their lives to save several pages of the book. These revelations were later printed in the Doctrine and Covenants.
